lead_paragraph: Laura Halldorson is stepping down as the women’s coach at the University of Minnesota after guiding the team to three national titles in 11 years. The university said she had been considering the move for some time because of the job’s demands. Halldorson’s teams won titles in 2000, 2004 and 2005. She was two years into a three-year contract extension. The Gophers finished 23-12-1 last season.
